settings.title: Recipes to try with your BIY

settings.content: 2x Original Milk Choc Cookie Doughs
2x White Choc Cookie Doughs
1x Biscoff Cookie Dough
1x Pot of Nutella
1x Pot of Biscoff Spread
1x Pot of Caramel Sauce
1 x Pot of Chocolate Sauce
2x Kinder Bars
2x Biscoff Biscuits
Ice Cream! Serve with your own fresh vanilla ice cream for the perfect experience.
An oven, baking paper and clean washed hands! See the instructional leaflet for more information.

All of our BIY packs contain MILK (Dairy), WHEAT (Gluten), SOYA and traces of NUTS and traces of EGG as it produced in a factory that contains nuts and eggs. This pack includes Nutella which contains HAZELNUTS.

COOKIE DOUGH - Place Cookie Dough in the fridge (or freezer) as soon as received. Keep in the fridge for up to 10 days, or freeze it on the first day of receiving it for up to 3 months. Remove from the freezer and store in the fridge for 8 hours before baking.

settings.faq_answer:
All products contain WHEAT, GLUTEN, DAIRY, SOYA and MAY CONTAIN TRACES OF NUTS & PEANUTS.

Our Cookie Dough products do not use egg as an ingredient, but may contain traces of egg. It is VEGETARIAN FRIENDLY and HALAL.

Our Stackos contain EGG. 

Please check each product description for specific allergen information, e.g. Nutella contains HAZELNUTS and Peanut Butter products contain PEANUTS. If ordering in store please ask our staff for any allergen advice required.

settings.faq_question: Do you have Vegan or Gluten-Free products? What about alcohol-free, vegetarian or Halal?
settings.faq_answer:
Vegan - YES we do! We have our Vegan BIY Pack which is 100% vegan!

Gluten-Free - Currently all our products contain Gluten. We are hoping to create some Gluten-Free items in the future. 

Alcohol-free/Vegetarian/Halal - All of our products are alcohol-free, vegetarian, and Halal. Please note that Stackos do contain free-range eggs, though.

settings.faq_question: What is the best way to get in touch if I have a question regarding my order?
settings.faq_answer: Email is the way to go! Our social media team are unable to action anything relating to orders through a DM or a comment, so please email orders@mycookiedough.com so our customer service team will be able to get back to you. Any order-related DMs will be asked to send our team an email, so to save time, please email us right off the bat and weâ€™ll be happy to help!

settings.faq_question: Do you offer delivery or takeaway?
settings.faq_answer:
**PLEASE NOTE: Due to COVID our open stores will be doing takeaway only and Click and Collect may be unavailable for some stores at this time**

As our product is baked freshly on site we recommend you eat your Cookie Dough when you purchase. However, if you inform our staff you would like to takeaway at the time of your order, we can box it up for you to go. 

Click & Collect is available at selected stores, please see the page for more information on how to order.

If you're looking for Cookie Dough delivered to your door, try one of our BIY or Stacko packs from the online shop.

settings.faq_question: Online Products: Can I swap out a flavour if I don't like one in the pack?
settings.faq_answer: Unfortunately due to our small team during this busy time, we are unable to personalise/customise any orders. We do hope to offer more personalisation in the future though!

settings.faq_question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.faq_answer:
Our current dispatch time for orders is approximately 1-3 working days (Monday-Friday) from the day the order was placed. Once dispatched, all orders should be delivered on a â€œnext-dayâ€ DPD service so your treats will arrive perfectly fresh and delicious.

Please only get in touch with our customer service team if it has been longer than 5 working days (Monday-Friday) since your order was placed.

settings.faq_question: Can I add a note to my order as it is a gift for someone?
settings.faq_answer: Unfortunately, this is not a service we offer currently. We will send you an email once DPD has received your parcel (meaning it will likely be delivered the following day) and DPD will send you an SMS or email to let you know the 1-hour slot your gift will be delivered to the recipient if you wish to send an e-card or a text message to go along with it.

settings.faq_question: I have a question but havenâ€™t heard back from you!
settings.faq_answer: Our customer service team is very small, and we are doing our best to get back to everyone within 2 working days, but please bear with us. Please refrain from sending duplicate emails as this only complicates things on our end and may delay you receiving a response. Thank you for your understanding!

settings.faq_question: Do you have any tips for baking the Cookie Dough?
settings.faq_answer:
Yes we do!
1. Make sure you use baking paper when cooking
2. Ensure your oven is completely preheated before beginning to bake.
3. It is a good idea to chill your baking tray before baking - your cookie dough should also be chilled.
4. Once the cookie dough is slightly golden brown (usually after 8-9 minutes), remove it from the oven. You can use a large spatula to push on the 4 sides to prevent it expanding too much, and to help it keep its â€˜square shapeâ€™.
5. Gently (very gently) wriggle the spatula completely under the cookie dough, before transferring to a plate to decorate & EAT!

settings.faq_question: My Cookie Dough is still soft after extra time in the ovenâ€¦?
settings.faq_answer: Our cookie dough is not like a cookie and is not intended to go hard in the oven. It will always remain soft to touch, even after extra time in the oven! It will be soft on the inside and crispy on the edges/outside. Our recommended baking time of 8-9 minutes in the oven is a guide and will apply to most ovens. It will only harden up if left to cool down (although it is much better served fresh out of the oven!)

settings.title:
Freshly baked
cookie dough
settings.content: Weâ€™ve been baking since 2014 and perfecting our recipes to bring you the best quality cookie dough & cookies, coffees, milkshakes and more. From kiosk to cafÃ©, even straight to your door. With multiple locations in the UK & around the world, MyCookieDough is the place to take time out of your busy day, bring family and friends together and indulge in the moment.

settings.review: Iâ€™ve been going to my cookie dough every week for the past 5 years and it gets better every time. My favourite is the kinder and Nutella with smarties, brownies pieces and salted Carmel sauce. I really recommend the Nutella milkshake if youâ€™re looking to get a drink instead
MyCookieDough is one of the best dessert shops I have been to! The Kinder cookie dough is my go-to whenever I'm out shopping - the flavours just melt in your mouth, especially with the ice cream!

If you have a little bit of a sweet tooth like I do, you have to try MyCookieDough. The cookie dough is so soft yet crispy at the same time and they're super generous with toppings. I recommend the Caramelised Biscuit Stack!
MyCookieDough is our go to treat! We love sharing one of their stacks or getting a milkshake each, the milkshakes are delicious, super creamy and full of flavour!

settings.section_title:
Todayâ€™s good mood is
sponsored by cookiesâ€¦

settings.content:
It all started when two University students studying Food Science met and bonded over their shared love for sweet treats, especially cookies!
They would spend their Friday evenings whipping up batches of homemade cookie dough, with different flavours, and toppings to indulge in the soft baked cookies with ice cream. They couldnâ€™t understand why this delicious combo wasnâ€™t readily available in the market. And so, the idea of MyCookieDough came to life.

settings.upper_content: Their mission was clear: to create a place where people could pause from their busy lives and indulge in the most mouth-watering, freshly baked cookies & cookie dough.
settings.bottom_content:
After over a year of hard work, they opened up their first store in 2014 in Cardiff and quickly gained a reputation for irresistible treats.
They then faced their first challenge of finding a bakery that could replicate their vision for cookie dough. Undeterred, they took matters into their own hands and established their own bakery in the southwest of England. With an unwavering commitment to top-quality ingredients and innovative methods, they earned a reputation for producing the most delicious and indulgent cookie dough, and the brand grew exponentially. MyCookieDough soon became the go-to destination for cookie lovers throughout the UK. As they expanded, both nationally and internationally, they maintained their original bakery and perfected their unique techniques.

settings.content:
Today, MyCookieDough is not just a brand; it is a heartfelt passion. The founders love for desserts, sweet treats, and cookies remains the driving force behind everything they do. Each day, they strive to create the ultimate cookie experience for their customers, reminiscent of the very moment it all began in their kitchen. Whether you find yourself in London, Qatar, or anywhere in between, you can indulge in the same delightful cookie dough that started their journey.


So go ahead and indulge, because at MyCookieDough, it's not just about the cookieâ€”it's about the moment.

After launching the UKs most successful cookie dough company My Cookie Dough was bombarded with requests for a baked cookie offering so customers could enjoy My Cookie Doughâ€™s innovative and indulgent flavours anywhere at any time.

settings.upper_content: So, we took our original secret cookie dough recipe and developed it to make the best tasting baked cookies on the market, alongside developing our brand new vegan dough!
settings.bottom_content: My Cookies are the to go cookie brand for freshly baked cookies made with high quality ingredients that delivers on indulgence time and time again. Our revolving menu is based on seasonal flavours and reflect current trends and latest pastry techniques meaning that you will always have something new to try.

settings.content: Our cookies will never be bland and boring, youâ€™ll always have something new and innovative to try. Want a flavour? Just request it. Drop us a line on Instagram or TikTok.

settings.download-pack-title: HERE ARE THE INSTRUCTIONAL LEAFLETS FOR OUR BIY PACKS:
settings.baking-tips: Tips for baking MyCookieDough like a pro:

settings.tip-content: Make sure you use baking paper when cooking
Ensure your oven is completely preheated before beginning to bake
It is a good idea to chill your baking tray before baking - your cookie dough should also be chilled

Once the cookie dough is slightly golden brown (usually after 8-9 minutes), remove it from the oven. You can use a large spatula to push on the 4 sides to prevent it expanding too much, and to help it keep its â€˜square shapeâ€™
Gently (very gently) wriggle the spatula completely under the cookie dough, before transferring to a plate to decorate & EAT!

settings.content: In your Skillet pack, you will receive enough Cookie Dough to make 2 Skillets plus a range of delicious toppings. Below is a guideline for using our Skillet packs.
settings.baking-tips: IMPORTANT! DON'T FORGET TO LOOK AFTER YOUR SKILLET: Please care for your Cast Iron Skillet correctly to avoid it turning orange by following these steps.

settings.tip-content: Take some Cookie Dough and mould it into the bottom of the pan
Add the desired sauces or toppings to create the middle filling
Flatten out some more Cookie Dough to place on top
Leave to cool for 8-10 minutes (Be careful as the skillet will be VERY HOT!)
Finish with desired toppings or sauces. We recommend serving with a bit of ice cream!

settings.faq_question: How can I store My Cookie Dough?
settings.faq_answer: If you are not using your Cookie Dough immediately, place in the fridge or freezer as soon as you have received your pack. It can be kept in the fridge for up to 10 days, or if stored in the freezer on the first day of receiving for up to 3 months. When you want to use your Cookie Dough remove from the freezer and store in the fridge for 4 hours before baking.

All products contain WHEAT, GLUTEN, DAIRY, SOYA and MAY CONTAIN TRACES OF NUTS & PEANUTS.

Our Cookie Dough products do not use egg as an ingredient, but may contain traces of egg. It is VEGETARIAN FRIENDLY and HALAL.

Our Stackos contain EGG.

Please check each product description for specific allergen information, e.g. Nutella contains HAZELNUTS. If ordering in store please ask our staff for any allergen advice required.

settings.faq_question: Why is My Cookie Dough still soft after extra time in the oven?
settings.faq_answer: Our cookie dough is not like a cookie and is not intended to go hard in the oven. It will always remain soft to touch, even after extra time in the oven! It will be soft on the inside and crispy on the edges/outside. Our recommended baking time of 8-9 minutes in the oven is a guide and will apply to most ovens. It will only harden up if left to cool down (although it is much better served fresh out of the oven!)

settings.faq_question: What does the franchise program include?
settings.faq_answer: The MY COOKIE DOUGH franchise programme includes the use of the MY COOKIE DOUGH brand name, as well as our business model, raw materials specifications, products, production methods, recipes, operational standards and procedures, and store design.

We want to ensure that your business will be a success, so we will guide and support you in every step along the way.
We provide support in the following areas:
â€¢ Site selection
â€¢ Store layout and design
â€¢ Production methods, recipes and presentation techniques
â€¢ Training and HR
â€¢ Operations
â€¢ Marketing

settings.faq_question: What training can I expect to receive?
settings.faq_answer: We provide a comprehensive training programme for all new partners, that spans over 8 weeks. The training takes place in your home country as well as in one of our stores in the UK, so you will need to send your team over. The in-depth training programme includes front to back operations support provided by our Operations team, as well as training and operations manuals to take along with you.

settings.faq_question: How long will the whole process take?
settings.faq_answer: Usually, it takes about 9 months from when you first make contact to when your first store will be ready for opening. This, however, is only a guideline as there are several factors that can affect the process. We will always work at a pace that you are comfortable with and discuss the progress of your store regularly so we can support you in every way we can.

settings.heading: My Cookie Dough Around The World
settings.left_content: Ever since we embarked on our sweet adventure, we've carried a grand vision to make our little brand known far and wide. From the moment we opened our very first store in the UK, our delicious cookie dough and cookies have begun travelling the globe, creating special moments of enjoyment for people. The journey has been nothing short of exhilaratingâ€”full of excitement, challenges, and oh-so-rewarding moments.
settings.right_content:
While our dreams and ambitious are big, we remain committed to growing thoughtfully and true to our mission: delivering indulgent moments that bring people together. We pour our hearts into every delicious creation, ensuring that every bite is a taste of pure heaven meant to be shared with friends.

To make this journey even more extraordinary, we seek like-minded individualsâ€”partners who resonate with our values, embrace our mission, and radiate a sweet passion for all things Cookie Dough! We extend a warm invitation to join us on this exciting journey!Â 

If you're eager to learn more, please don't hesitate to reach out.Â

settings.review: â€œVisiting My Cookie Dough way back in 2018, I instantly knew this brand needs to be open in Malta. Fast forward to November 2022 we opened our very first store in Malta's biggest shopping Mall. Working alongside the founders to open this Franchise in Malta was an absolute pleasure of an experience. The Cookie doughs, Milkshakes, Cookies and coffees are all made with love and the response has, without a doubt been stellarâ€
